column3: Strathclyde Institute for Pharmacy & Biomedical Sciences
column5: Firstly, unlike many Biomedical Sciences Masters courses, we offer you dedicated training in a broad suite of bioinformatics and practical laboratory skills. These will not only be great preparation for future research careers, but also a way to make the most of your summer research project.Secondly, our taught classes capture the excitement of cutting-edge research fields.The substantial choice of classes means that you'll get to select a clinical-oriented or basic life science research pathway to suit your future aspirations.The course provides the perfect springboard to future training at PhD level, or gives you a range of experience that will prove attractive to employers from industry or the health-care provision sector.
